p.s: I hope you're doing well.
You send me an interesting newspaper article about my school going sustainable.
The article was published on November of 2019 in a famous local newspaper.
It is about a new special day at my school that is only about climate and climate protection.
The students can visit over 40 different workshops in school, but also in the whole city of Cologne.
All of the workshops deal with climate protection.
It was the first time that this took place at my school.
Students and teachers have cooperated to create great workshops.
A teacher at my school says that many students participated on demonstrations of the Fridays for Future movement in the last months and that the interest in political themes is rising.
The topic is more present than ever.
Because of this they founded this special day with many different offers, so that the students aren's loosinglosing interest again because they think that they can't do anything about climate change.
But actually there are many ways to be more responsible and sustainable.
There were many different ideas for a climate-friendly lifestyle.
For example Foodsharingfood sharing, using less water by just showering, second-hand shopping with used clothes and so on.
Furthermore the students thought about how to sell fairtrade products at our school.
There was a fairtrade cafecaf√©, where you could buy vegan cake or fair produced caffecoffee.
This was initiated by two students who are convinced by the project and want to show how delicious vegan food can be.
Furthermore two poetry slammers visited our school.
One of them teachedtaught the students about their voice and pronouncitationpronunciation.
This could help them in discussions for example about the climate.
All in all the article says that everyone participated well and that the students were very interested.
So the idea worked great, so that there maybe will be a next time.
I will inform you if the project will take place next year.
If you are interested you could mabye visit me and see it with your own eyes.
I hope I could help you, if you have any questions left don't be afraid to text me.
Have a great day.

p.signed: Greetings from Germany, your friend Jane
